name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_115In
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "In" means the element "indium" and "115In" is the isotope "indium-115" with a half-life of 1.86e+18 days.
